body_html:
I wonder if we're getting the string properly utf8 encoded from python. Worth checking.
…
On Mar 22, 2017 11:16 PM, "Xianliang Wang" ***@***.***> wrote: Maybe the bug is not related to the ANSI version of GetFileAttributesExA. I created a new project, and used the code snippet of GetFileSize. The function can get the file attributes correctly whenever the input file name contains non ASCII characters or not. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
I wonder if we're getting the string properly utf8 encoded from python.
Worth checking.

On Mar 22, 2017 11:16 PM, "Xianliang Wang" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Maybe the bug is not related to the ANSI version of GetFileAttributesExA.
> I created a new project, and used the code snippet of GetFileSize. The
> function can get the file attributes correctly whenever the input file name
> contains non ASCII characters or not.
